revised_title: Discovery of a New Celestial Motion and Its Relation to Earth's Axis
tldr: The author, James Bradley, observed a new motion in the fixed stars and discovered that it was not due to annual parallax or nutation of the Earth's axis. This led to the realization that there was a regular cause for the unexpected motion, which was later identified as a new celestial motion related to the Sun's position with respect to the equinoctial points.
